title: Admin file downloads in multiple formats + remove outdated stat copy

requirements.text: Add a download options menu in the Admin Dashboard that allows admins to download files (documents, deliverables, to-do attachments) in the following formats: PDF, spreadsheet (XLSX/CSV), document (DOCX), CSV, ZIP folder, or image (PNG/JPG). The download button should present a dropdown with these format options. For formats that require conversion (e.g., exporting a list as CSV or ZIP), generate the file client-side from available data. For file blobs already stored (e.g., uploaded documents and deliverables), provide direct download with the selected format extension. ZIP downloads should bundle multiple selected files into a single archive.

quotes: Admins can download files as PDFs, spreadsheets, documents, CSVs, ZIP folders, or images.

acceptanceCriteria: Admin users see a download dropdown with options: PDF, Spreadsheet, Document, CSV, ZIP, Image on relevant tables (DocumentTable, AdminClientDeliverableTable, ComplianceAdminToDoList).
Selecting CSV exports the visible table data as a .csv file download.
Selecting ZIP bundles available file blobs into a downloadable .zip archive.
Selecting PDF triggers a print-to-PDF or generates a PDF from the table/document data.
Selecting Image downloads the file as a .png or .jpg where applicable.
Selecting Spreadsheet downloads data as a .xlsx or .csv file.
Selecting Document downloads the file as a .docx where applicable.
Download functionality is only accessible to authenticated admin users (AdminGuard protected).
Non-admin users do not see the download format options.

requirements.text: Remove the '99.8% filling accuracy' statistic and the 'client support 24/7' text from all locations in the frontend UI where they currently appear (likely on the HomePage stats/marketing section).

quotes: Remove the 99.8% filling accuracy and client support 24/7.

acceptanceCriteria: The text '99.8% filling accuracy' (or similar variant) does not appear anywhere in the rendered UI.
The text 'client support 24/7' (or similar variant such as '24/7 support') does not appear anywhere in the rendered UI.
Removing these items does not break the layout of the section they were in; remaining stat cards or items are laid out cleanly.

constraints: Admin download functionality must respect the AdminGuard â€” only authenticated admins may access it.
Do not modify files under frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts, frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, frontend/src/main.tsx, or frontend/src/components/ui.
File downloads must be generated client-side; do not add new backend endpoints solely for format conversion.
All backend Motoko logic must remain in backend/main.mo (single-actor architecture).
nonGoals: Server-side file format conversion or new backend download endpoints.
Adding download capabilities to non-admin (client) views.
Changing any other marketing copy beyond the two specified stat items.
Implementing real-time file processing or external conversion APIs.
